content.query:
--test
---Standardized.L_CUSTOMER_CARD
CREATE PROCEDURE L_CUSTOMER_CARD_ETL @data_date date
AS BEGIN
    TRUNCATE TABLE [Standardized].[L_CUSTOMER_CARD];
	INSERT INTO [Standardized].[L_CUSTOMER_CARD]
    SELECT

        Standardized.FunctionHashMD5('CUSTOMER_CARD' + '-' + b.client_number + '-' + a.id + '-' + a.contract_number) AS [Customer_X_Card Hashkey]

        ,Standardized.FunctionHashMD5('CUSTOMER' + '-' + b.client_number ) AS [Customer HashKey]

        ,Standardized.FunctionHashMD5('CARD' + '-' + a.id + '-' + a.contract_number) AS [Card HashKey]

        ,'LandingBank.Card' AS [Record Source]

        ,CONVERT(date, GETDATE() ,103) AS [Load Date]

    FROM [LandingBank].[Card]  a 

    INNER JOIN [LandingBank].[CardClient]  b on b.data_date=@data_date and b.amnd_state='A' and b.id=a.client__id

    where a.data_date=@data_date and a.amnd_state='A' and a.con_cat='C' and a.base_relation is null 
END;
EXEC L_CUSTOMER_CARD_ETL '2022-08-31';
DROP PROCEDURE L_CUSTOMER_CARD_ETL;
select * from [Standardized].[L_CUSTOMER_CARD];


---Standardized.S_CARD
CREATE PROCEDURE S_CARD_ETL @data_date date
AS BEGIN
    TRUNCATE TABLE [Standardized].[S_CARD];
	INSERT INTO [Standardized].[S_CARD]
    SELECT

        Standardized.FunctionHashMD5('CARD' + '-' + a.id + '-' + a.contract_number) AS [Card HashKey]

        , a.date_open AS [Card Open Date]

        , COALESCE(a.date_expire, '2400-01-01') AS [Card Expiry Date]

        , a.card_classifier_name AS [Card Class]

        ,'LandingBank.Card' AS [Record Source]

        ,CONVERT(date, GETDATE() ,103) AS [Load Date]

    FROM [LandingBank].[Card]  a 

    --INNER JOIN [LandingBank].[CardClient]  b on b.data_date=20220831 and b.amnd_state='A' and b.id=a.client__id

    where a.data_date=@data_date and a.amnd_state='A' and a.con_cat='C' and a.base_relation is null 
END;

---Standardized.S_ACCOUNT
CREATE PROCEDURE S_ACCOUNT_ETL @data_date date
AS BEGIN
    TRUNCATE TABLE [Standardized].[S_ACCOUNT];
	INSERT INTO [Standardized].[S_ACCOUNT]
    SELECT

    Standardized.FunctionHashMD5('ACCOUNT' + '-' + a.id + '-' + a.contract_number) AS [Account HashKey]

    , a.contr_status AS [Account Status]

    ,'LandingBank.Card' AS [Record Source]

    ,CONVERT(date, GETDATE() ,103) AS [Load Date]

    ,CONVERT(date, '2400-01-01' ,126) as [Load End Date]

    FROM [LandingBank].[Card]  a 
    where a.data_date=@data_date and a.amnd_state='A' and a.con_cat='A' and a.contract_number not like '%-L-L%' 

END;
EXEC S_ACCOUNT_ETL '2022-08-31';
DROP PROCEDURE S_ACCOUNT_ETL;
select * from [Standardized].[S_ACCOUNT];

---Standardized.S_CUSTOMER_CONTACT
CREATE PROCEDURE S_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_ETL @data_date date
AS BEGIN
    TRUNCATE TABLE [Standardized].[S_CUSTOMER_CONTACT];
	INSERT INTO [Standardized].[S_CUSTOMER_CONTACT]
    SELECT 

    Standardized.FunctionHashMD5('CUSTOMER' + '-' + a.id ) AS [Customer HashKey]

    ,a.t_email_1 [Email]

    ,a.t_phone_1 [Phone]

    ,a.t_address [Address]

    ,'LandingBank.Customer' AS [Record Source]

    ,CONVERT(date, GETDATE() ,103) AS [Load Date]

    ,CONVERT(date, '2400-01-01' ,126) as [Load End Date]

 FROM [LandingBank].[Customer]  a 

where a.data_date=@data_date 
END;


---Standardized.S_CUSTOMER_DEMO
CREATE PROCEDURE S_CUSTOMER_DEMO_ETL @data_date date
AS BEGIN
    TRUNCATE TABLE [Standardized].[S_CUSTOMER_DEMO];
	INSERT INTO [Standardized].[S_CUSTOMER_DEMO]
SELECT 

    Standardized.FunctionHashMD5('CUSTOMER' + '-' + a.id ) AS [Customer HashKey]

    ,a.t_name_1 AS [Name]

    ,a.t_gender AS [Gender]

    ,t_marital_status AS [Marital Status]

    ,t_nationality AS [Country of Citizen]

    ,t_job_title AS [Employmen Position]

    ,t_net_monthly_in AS [Living Standard]

    ,'LandingBank.Customer' AS [Record Source]

    ,CONVERT(date, GETDATE() ,103) AS [Load Date]

    ,CONVERT(date, '2400-01-01' ,126) as [Load End Date]

  FROM [LandingBank].[Customer]  a 

where a.data_date=@data_date
END;


---Standardized.S_CUSTOMER_GEN_INFO
CREATE PROCEDURE S_CUSTOMER_GEN_INFO_ETL @data_date date
AS BEGIN
    TRUNCATE TABLE [Standardized].[S_CUSTOMER_GEN_INFO];
	INSERT INTO [Standardized].[S_CUSTOMER_GEN_INFO]
SELECT 

    Standardized.FunctionHashMD5('CUSTOMER' + '-' + a.id ) AS [Customer HashKey]

    , a.t_sector as [Segment]

    ,'LandingBank.Customer' AS [Record Source]

    ,CONVERT(date, GETDATE() ,103) AS [Load Date]

    ,CONVERT(date, '2400-01-01' ,126) as [Load End Date]

 FROM [LandingBank].[Customer]  a 

where a.data_date=@data_date
END
;

---Standardized.S_TRANSACTION_TURNOVER
CREATE PROCEDURE S_TRANSACTION_TURNOVER_ETL @data_date date
AS BEGIN
    TRUNCATE TABLE [Standardized].[S_TRANSACTION_TURNOVER];
	INSERT INTO [Standardized].[S_TRANSACTION_TURNOVER]
SELECT

    Standardized.FunctionHashMD5('TRANSACTION' + '-' + a.id ) AS [Transaction HashKey]

    , convert(decimal(20,0) ,a.Settl_Amount) as [Transaction Amount]

    ,'LandingBank.CardTransaction' AS [Record Source]

    ,CONVERT(date, GETDATE() ,103) AS [Load Date]

    ,CONVERT(date, '2400-01-01' ,126) as [Load End Date]

 FROM [LandingBank].[CardTransaction]  a 

where a.data_date=@data_date and a.amnd_state='A'
END;

--DIM_CARD
CREATE PROCEDURE DIM_CARD_ETL
AS BEGIN
    TRUNCATE TABLE [Curated].[DIM_CARD];
    -- SET IDENTITY_INSERT [Curated].[DIM_CARD] ON;
	INSERT INTO [Curated].[DIM_CARD]
    SELECT 
    a.[Card HashKey] as CARD_ID
    ,a.[Card Number]  as CARD_NUMBER
    ,CONVERT(date, GETDATE() ,126) AS EFFECT_FROM_DATE
    ,CONVERT(date, '2400-01-01' ,126) as EFFECT_TO_DATE
    ,SUBSTRING(c.[Account Number], CHARINDEX('-', c.[Account Number])+1, LEN(c.[Account Number]) - CHARINDEX('-', c.[Account Number]) + 1)   AS [CARD_ACCOUNT_NUMBER]
    ,e.[Customer Number] as [CUSTOMER_NUMBER]
    ,'Active' as [CARD_STATUS]
    ,case when g.[Account Status] like '5%' then 'Activate' else 'Waiting on Close' END  as [CARD_ACCOUNT_STATUS]
    ,l.[Branch Number] as [BRANCH_CODE]
    ,'CN'+ l.[Branch Number] as [BRANCH_NAME]
    ,f.[Card Open Date] as [CARD_OPEN_DATE]
    ,f.[Card Expiry Date] as [CARD_EXPIRY_DATE]
    ,case when f.[Card Expiry Date]='2400-01-01' then 'Never Expired' else 'Expired on'+ f.[Card Expiry Date] END as [CARD_EXPIRY_STATUS]
    ,f.[Card Class] as [CARD_CLASS]
    ,i.[Product Number] as [CARD_PRODUCT]
    FROM [Standardized].[H_CARD] a
    INNER join [Standardized].[L_ACCOUNT_CARD] b on a.[Card HashKey]=  b.[Card HashKey]
    INNER JOIN [Standardized].[H_ACCOUNT] c on b.[Account Hashkey]= c.[Account Hashkey]
    INNER JOIN [Standardized].[L_CUSTOMER_CARD] d on a.[Card HashKey]=  d.[Card HashKey]
    INNER JOIN [Standardized].[H_CUSTOMER] e on d.[Customer Hashkey]= e.[Customer Hashkey]
    INNER JOIN [Standardized].[S_CARD] f on a.[Card HashKey]=  f.[Card HashKey]
    INNER JOIN [Standardized].[S_ACCOUNT] g on c.[Account HashKey]=  g.[Account HashKey]
    INNER join [Standardized].[L_CARD_PRODUCT] h on a.[Card HashKey]=  h.[Card HashKey]
    INNER JOIN [Standardized].[H_PRODUCT] i on i.[Product HashKey]=  h.[Product HashKey]
    INNER join [Standardized].[L_CARD_BRANCH] k on a.[Card HashKey]=  k.[Card HashKey]
    INNER JOIN [Standardized].[H_BRANCH] L on K.[Branch HashKey]=  L.[Branch HashKey]
    ;
    -- SET IDENTITY_INSERT [Curated].[DIM_CARD] OFF;
END;
EXEC DIM_CARD_ETL;
DROP PROCEDURE DIM_CARD_ETL;
SELECT * FROM Curated.DIM_CARD;
select * from Standardized.H_PRODUCT;
---DIM_INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER
CREATE PROCEDURE DIM_INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER_ETL
AS BEGIN
    TRUNCATE TABLE [Curated].[DIM_INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER];
	INSERT INTO [Curated].[DIM_INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER]
    SELECT 
    a.[Customer HashKey] as [INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER_ID]
    ,a.[Customer Number] as [INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER_NUMBER]
    ,CONVERT(date, GETDATE() ,126) AS [EFFECT_FROM_DATE]
    ,CONVERT(date, '2400-01-01' ,126) as [EEFECT_TO_DATE]
    ,c.[Gender] as  [GENDER]
    ,c.[Marital Status] as [MARITAL_STATUS]
    ,c.[Country of Citizen] as [CTY_OF_CTZN]
    ,c.[Living Standard] as [LIVING_STANDARD]
    ,c.[Employmen Position] as [EMPLOYMENT_POSITION]
    ,d.[Segment] as [SEGMENT]
    ,c.[Name] as [CUSTOMER_FULL_NAME]
    ,b.[Phone] as [CUSTOMER_PHONE_NUMBER]
    FROM [Standardized].[H_CUSTOMER] a 
    inner join [Standardized].[S_CUSTOMER_CONTACT] B on a.[Customer HashKey] = b.[Customer HashKey]
    inner join [Standardized].[S_CUSTOMER_DEMO] C on a.[Customer HashKey] = c.[Customer HashKey]
    inner join [Standardized].[S_CUSTOMER_GEN_INFO] D on a.[Customer HashKey] = d.[Customer HashKey]
END; 
EXEC S_CUSTOMER_GEN_INFO_ETL '2022-08-31';
DROP PROCEDURE DIM_INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER_ETL;
SELECT * FROM Curated.DIM_INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER;

---DIM_CARD_ACCOUNT
CREATE PROCEDURE DIM_CARD_ACCOUNT_ETL
AS BEGIN
    TRUNCATE TABLE [Curated].[DIM_CARD_ACCOUNT];
	INSERT INTO [Curated].[DIM_CARD_ACCOUNT]
    SELECT
    a.[Account Hashkey] as [CARD_ACCOUNT_ID]
    ,SUBSTRING(a.[Account Number], CHARINDEX('-', a.[Account Number])+1, LEN(a.[Account Number]) - CHARINDEX('-', a.[Account Number]) + 1)   as [CARD_ACCOUNT_NUIMBER]
    ,CONVERT(date, GETDATE() ,126) AS [EFFECT_FROM_DATE]
    ,CONVERT(date, '2400-01-01' ,126) as [EEFECT_TO_DATE]
    ,e.[Customer Number] as [CUSTOMER_NUMBER]
    ,l.[Branch Number] as [BRANCH_CODE]
    ,'CN'+ l.[Branch Number] as [BRANCH_NAME]
    FROM [Standardized].[H_ACCOUNT] a 
    inner join [Standardized].[L_ACCOUNT_BRANCH] b ON a.[Account Hashkey] = b.[Account Hashkey]
    INNER join [Standardized].[L_ACCOUNT_CARD] c on a.[Account HashKey]=  c.[Account HashKey]
    INNER JOIN [Standardized].[L_CUSTOMER_CARD] d on c.[Card HashKey]=  d.[Card HashKey]
    INNER JOIN [Standardized].[H_CUSTOMER] e on d.[Customer Hashkey]= e.[Customer Hashkey]
    INNER JOIN [Standardized].[H_BRANCH] L on b.[Branch HashKey]=  L.[Branch HashKey]
END;
EXEC [StandardizedBank].[ProcedureAccount] '20220831';
select * from [Standardized].[H_ACCOUNT];
DROP PROCEDURE DIM_CARD_ACCOUNT_ETL;
SELECT * FROM Curated.DIM_CARD_ACCOUNT;

---FACT_CARD_TRANSACTION
CREATE PROCEDURE FACT_CARD_TRANSACTION_ETL @data_date nchar(8)
AS BEGIN
    TRUNCATE TABLE [Curated].[FACT_CARD_TRANSACTION];
	INSERT INTO [Curated].[FACT_CARD_TRANSACTION]
    SELECT
    @data_date AS [DATE_DIM_ID]
    ,COALESCE(dic.[INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER_DIM_ID],-1) as [INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER_DIM_ID]
    ,COALESCE(dc.[CARD_DIM_ID],-1) as [CARD_DIM_ID]
    ,COALESCE(dca.[CARD_ACCOUNT_DIM_ID],-1) as [CARD_ACCOUNT_DIM_ID]
    ,a.[Transaction Number] as [TRAN_ID]
    ,s.[Transaction Amount] as [TRAN_AMT]
    ,CASE COALESCE(dic.[INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER_DIM_ID],-1)%10 
    WHEN 1 THEN 1 
    WHEN 2 THEN 2
    WHEN 3 THEN 3
    WHEN 4 THEN 4
    WHEN 5 THEN 5
    WHEN 6 THEN 6
    WHEN 7 THEN 7
    WHEN 8 THEN 8
    WHEN 9 THEN 9
    ELSE 10 END as [CUSTOMER_TYPE]
    FROM [Standardized].[H_TRANSACTION] a 
    INNER JOIN [Standardized].[L_CARD_TRANSACTION] b on a.[Transaction HashKey]= b.[Transaction HashKey]
    INNER JOIN [Standardized].[L_CUSTOMER_CARD] c on b.[Card HashKey]=  c.[Card HashKey]
    INNER join [Standardized].[L_ACCOUNT_CARD] d on c.[Card HashKey]=  d.[Card HashKey]
    INNER JOIN [Standardized].[S_TRANSACTION_TURNOVER] s on a.[Transaction HashKey]=  s.[Transaction HashKey]
    LEFT JOIN [Curated].[DIM_INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER] dic on c.[Customer HashKey]=dic.[INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER_ID] and CONVERT(date, @data_date) between dic.[EFFECT_FROM_DATE] and dic.[EEFECT_TO_DATE]
    LEFT JOIN [Curated].[DIM_CARD] dc on c.[Card HashKey]=dc.[CARD_ID] and CONVERT(date, @data_date) between dc.[EFFECT_FROM_DATE] and dc.[EEFECT_TO_DATE]
    LEFT JOIN [Curated].[DIM_CARD_ACCOUNT] dca on d.[Account HashKey]=dca.[CARD_ACCOUNT_ID] and CONVERT(date, @data_date) between dca.[EFFECT_FROM_DATE] and dca.[EEFECT_TO_DATE]
END;
DROP PROCEDURE FACT_CARD_TRANSACTION_ETL;
EXEC FACT_CARD_TRANSACTION_ETL '20220831';
SELECT * FROM Curated.FACT_CARD_TRANSACTION;
select * from [Standardized].[L_CUSTOMER_CARD] where [Customer HashKey] = '6B725A812179E9FFBC56C00A1B0E42F7';
select * from [Curated].[DIM_INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER] where individual_customer_dim_id = 14843667;
select dic.[INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER_DIM_ID], dic.[INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER_ID] FROM [Standardized].[H_TRANSACTION] a 
    INNER JOIN [Standardized].[L_CARD_TRANSACTION] b on a.[Transaction HashKey]= b.[Transaction HashKey]
    INNER JOIN [Standardized].[L_CUSTOMER_CARD] c on b.[Card HashKey]=  c.[Card HashKey]
    INNER join [Standardized].[L_ACCOUNT_CARD] d on c.[Card HashKey]=  d.[Card HashKey]
    INNER JOIN [Standardized].[S_TRANSACTION_TURNOVER] s on a.[Transaction HashKey]=  s.[Transaction HashKey]
    JOIN [Curated].[DIM_INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER] dic on c.[Customer HashKey]=dic.[INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER_ID]
;
ALTER table Curated.FACT_CARD_TRANSACTION add CUSTOMER_TYPE nvarchar(400);
